item.title: K3s with Cilium Install
item.description: 1wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UltTransformer/demo/main/k8s/k3s/k3-install-single-node-part1.sh 2wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UltTransformer/demo/main/k8s/k3s/k3-install-single-node-part2.sh 3wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UltTransformer/demo/main/k8s/k3s/k3-install-single-node-on-reboot.sh 4chmod 111 k3-install-single-node-part1.sh 5chmod 111 k3-install-single-node-part2.sh 6chmod 111 k3-install-single-node-on-reboot.sh 7./k3-install-single-node-part1.sh Wait for the system to reboot and log back in and execute the next script. 1./k3-install-single-node-part2.sh If the system reboots at any stage you will need to re-point the environmental variable using the follow command: 1export KUBECONFIG=/etc/rancher/k3s/k3s.yaml
